Subject: Mentor Scheduling Conflict
Body: Hi Casey, I’ll need to leave by 2PM on Saturday. Can anyone cover the afternoon session for me?

Subject: Workshop Room Question
Body: Hi – Is GML E190 available for the Sunday feedback session? We’d like to reserve it.

Subject: Team Change Request
Body: One of our team members dropped out. Can we get a replacement or go ahead as a team of three?

Subject: Welcome to the Hackathon!
Body: Hello {name}, welcome to the {event}! We look forward to seeing you on {date}.

Subject: Welcome to the Hackathon!
Body: Hello {name}, we’re excited to have you join the Hackathon 2025! Don’t forget to check the schedule and prepare for the workshops.

Subject: Faculty Invitation to Hackathon
Body: Dear {name}, thank you for supporting Hackathon 2025. We would love for you to join as a mentor or judge. Let us know your availability.
